DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the feasibility and effectiveness of a multi-component school-based intervention to promote healthy eating and physical activity with school children ages 9 to 11 years in Lebanon.
DOC.brief_title: Interventions to Promote Healthy Eating and Physical Activity in Lebanese School Children Targeting Overweight and Obesity- Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: Schoolchildren Aged 9 to 11 years no exclusion criteria
